Plot: Three unknowing martial artists are summoned to a mysterious island to compete in a tournament whose outcome will decide the fate of the world.
Title: Mortal Kombat
Writer: Ed Boon (video games), John Tobias (video games), Kevin Droney
Actors: Christopher Lambert, Robin Shou, Linden Ashby, Cary-Hiroyuki Tagawa
tomatoConsensus: Despite an effective otherwordly atmosphere and appropriately cheesy visuals, Mortal Kombat suffers from its poorly constructed plot, laughable dialogue, and subpar acting.
